name: cwl-hello-world-workflow
description: Common Workflow Language (CWL) with RO-Crate packaging and a OWL example

scripts.help:
echo '
ðŸ“‹ Available Commands:

  Setup & Installation:
    npm run install:cwltool  - Install cwltool
    npm run setup            - Run setup script

  CWL Workflow:
    npm run start            - Start CWL workflow (alias for cwl:start)
    npm run cwl:start        - Run pizza workflow
    npm run cwl:validate     - Validate pizza.cwl
    npm run cwl:remove       - Remove cwltool cache

  RO-Crate:
    npm run ro-crate:start   - Run workflow in RO-Crate directory
    npm run ro-crate:build   - Build RO-Crate
    npm run ro-crate:remove  - Remove RO-Crate directory

  Help:
    npm run help             - Show this help message

'
scripts.ro-crate:start: cd ro-crate && python3 -m cwltool pizza.cwl pizza-job.json
